name: dungeon-hunter
description: A 2D pixel art game made using PixiJS. This game is implemented mostly following Rex van der Spuy's [Learn Pixi.js book](https://www.amazon.ca/Learn-Pixi-js-Rex-van-Spuy-ebook/dp/B01HXEJ4PC/ref=sr_1_1?ie=UTF8&qid=1513793710&sr=8-1&keywords=learn+pixi).
author: Charlie Guan
